name: Patrologia latina-dev
tagline: Machine-corrected versions of selections of the Patrologia Latina.
body:
#Welcome to patrologia_latina-dev!

##About
This repository does not contain the full collection but those works which haven't already been covered by our [CSEL digitisation effort](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/csel-dev). 

These XML files were produced by data entry company [Jouve](http://www.jouve.com/en) who OCR'd, corrected and encoded the text in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards. While the initial results are adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML.

##Volumes and works
The following are the PL works we have digitised. As previously stated, works you don't find here can be accessed over at our CSEL repository.

#### [Volume 14](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/patrologia_latina-dev/blob/master/PL14.xml)
* Ambrosius. _De Interpellatione Job Et David Liber Quatuor_
* Ambrosius. _Apologia Prophetae David Ad Theodosium Augustum_
* Ambrosius. _Apologia Altera Prophetae David_

#### [Volume 15](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/patrologia_latina-dev/tree/master/PL15)
* Ambrosius. _Commentarius In Cantica Canticorum_
* Ambrosius. _De Excidio Urbis Hierosolymitanae Libri Quinque_
* Ambrosius. _Historia De Excidio Hierosolymitanae Urbis Anacephalaeosis_

#### [Volume 34](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/patrologia_latina-dev/blob/master/PL34.xml)
* Augustinus. _De Doctrina Christiana Libri Quatuor. Admonitio_
* Augustinus. _De Doctrina Christiana Libri Quatuor_
* Augustinus. _De Vera Religione Liber Unus. Admonitio_
* Augustinus. _De Vera Religione Liber Unus_
* Augustinus. _De Genesi Contra Manichaeos Libri Duo. Admonitio_
* Augustinus. _De Genesi Contra Manichaeos Libri Duo_
* Augustinus. _De Sermone Domini In Monte Secundum Matthaeum. Admonitio_
* Augustinus. _De Sermone Domini In Monte Secundum Matthaeum_

#### [Volume 43](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/patrologia_latina-dev/blob/master/PL43.xml)
* Augustinus. _Ad Donatistas Post Collationem. Retractatio_
* Augustinus. _Ad Donatistas Post Collationem_
* Augustinus. _De Rusticiano Subdiacono A Donatistis Rebaptizato [Incertus]_
* Augustinus. _Excerpta Et Scripta Vetera ad Donatistarum Historiam Pertinentia_

#### [Volume 45](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/patrologia_latina-dev/blob/master/PL45.xml)
* Augustinus. _De Dono Perseverantiae_
* Augustinus. _Contra Secundam Juliani Responsionem_
* Augustinus. _Hypomnesticon_

#### [Volume 49](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/patrologia_latina-dev/blob/master/PL49.xml)
* Cassianus Ioannes. _Epistolas Castoris Aptensis Episcopi ad Cassianum Abbatem Massiliensem_

#### [Volume 50](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/patrologia_latina-dev/blob/master/PL50.xml)
* Cassianus Ioannes. _Paucae Quaedam Sententiae Piam Interpretationem Desiderantes_

#### [Volume 56](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/patrologia_latina-dev/blob/master/PL56.xml)
* Leo I. Magnus. _Sermones Inediti_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
